name: Under Ytan
description:
Under Ytan is a platformer game where you can dive into the platforms you walk on, creating a pretty different kind of challenge when trying to complete the levels.

Contains:

  • 10 levels with an optional collectible in in each one.
  • Crispy pixel graphics in CMYK colors.
  • Soundtrack by Isidor ( https://soundcloud.com/isidormusic ).
  • Tight platforming.
  • 3 different endings with consequences for the next play-through.

The game is originally made for Ludum Dare. This version is improved on over the 3 weeks following the competition.
